languages.text: {n}Вместе с Адальбертом вы преклоняете колени для молитвы. Преподобный негромко произносит:{/n} "И нет такой тьмы, что не бежала бы от света Его. И нет жизни лучше, чем прожитой во славу Его. Ибо любая сила и благость — только от Него и по воле Его".
languages.translation_comment: РТ и НПС становятся на колени, в конце реплики поднимаются.
РТ и НПС становятся на колени, в конце реплики поднимаются.

languages.text: {n}You and Adalbert kneel in prayer together. He says softly,{/n} "And there is no such darkness as would not flee from His light. Nor is there a life better than one lived for His glory. For all strength and all grace comes from Him alone and by His will."
languages.original_text: {n}Вместе с Адальбертом вы преклоняете колени для молитвы. Преподобный негромко произносит:{/n} "И нет такой тьмы, что не бежала бы от света Его. И нет жизни лучше, чем прожитой во славу Его. Ибо любая сила и благость — только от Него и по воле Его".

traits.locale_text: {n}You and Adalbert kneel in prayer together. He says softly,{/n} "And there is no such darkness as would not flee from His light. Nor is there a life better than one lived for His glory. For all strength and all grace comes from Him alone and by His will."

{n}You and Adalbert kneel at the altar together. The reverend says softly,{/n} "And there is no such darkness as would not flee from His light. Nor is there a life better than one lived for His glory. For all strength and all grace comes from Him alone and by His will."

{n}You and Adalbert kneel in prayer together. He says softly,{/n} "And there is no such darkness as would not flee from His light. Nor is there a life better than one lived for His glory. For all strength and all grace comes from Him alone and by His will."

{n}You and Adalbert kneel in prayer together. He says softly,{/n} "And there is no such darkness as would not flee from His light. Nor is there a life better than one lived for His glory. For all strength and all grace comes from Him alone and by His will."

{n}You and Adalbert kneel in prayer together. He says softly,{/n} "And there is no such darkness as would not flee from His light. Nor is there a life better than one lived for His glory. For all strength and all grace comes from Him alone and by His will."

languages.text: {n}Adalbert y tú os arrodilláis juntos a rezar. Dice con suavidad:{/n} «Y no hay ninguna oscuridad que pueda evitar huir ante Su luz, ni una vida mejor que la vivida por Su gloria, pues toda fuerza y toda gracia proviene solo de Él y por Su voluntad».
languages.original_text: {n}You and Adalbert kneel in prayer together. He says softly,{/n} "And there is no such darkness as would not flee from His light. Nor is there a life better than one lived for His glory. For all strength and all grace comes from Him alone and by His will."

traits.locale_text: {n}Adalbert y tú os arrodilláis juntos a rezar. Dice con suavidad:{/n} «Y no hay ninguna oscuridad que pueda evitar huir ante Su luz, ni una vida mejor que la vivida por Su gloria, pues toda fuerza y toda gracia proviene solo de Él y por Su voluntad».

languages.text: {n}あなたとアダルバートは共にひざまづいて祈る。彼は柔らかく告げた。{/n}「主の光から逃れられぬような暗闇はない。主の栄光のために生きる以上の善き人生もない。あらゆる力とあらゆる恵みは、主のみから、主の御心によってもたらされるのだから」
languages.original_text: {n}You and Adalbert kneel in prayer together. He says softly,{/n} "And there is no such darkness as would not flee from His light. Nor is there a life better than one lived for His glory. For all strength and all grace comes from Him alone and by His will."

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたとアダルバートは共にひざまづいて祈る。彼は柔らかく告げた。{/n}「主の光から逃れられぬような暗闇はない。主の栄光のために生きる以上の善き人生もない。あらゆる力とあらゆる恵みは、主のみから、主の御心によってもたらされるのだから」

languages.text: {n}你和阿达伯特一起跪下来祈祷，他以轻柔的声音开了口。{/n}“没有任何黑暗不会被祂的明光驱散，没有任何生活比侍奉祂的荣耀更加幸福。因为所有的力量与所有的恩典都完全源自于祂，一切都是祂的旨意。”
languages.original_text: {n}You and Adalbert kneel in prayer together. He says softly,{/n} "And there is no such darkness as would not flee from His light. Nor is there a life better than one lived for His glory. For all strength and all grace comes from Him alone and by His will."

traits.locale_text: {n}你和阿达伯特一起跪下来祈祷，他以轻柔的声音开了口。{/n}“没有任何黑暗不会被祂的明光驱散，没有任何生活比侍奉祂的荣耀更加幸福。因为所有的力量与所有的恩典都完全源自于祂，一切都是祂的旨意。”

languages.text: {n}Du sinkst neben Adalbert zum Gebet auf die Knie. Er sagt leise:{/n} "Es gibt keine Dunkelheit, die nicht vor Seinem Licht flieht. Und es gibt kein besseres Leben, als ein Leben für Seinen Ruhm. Denn Stärke und Anmut kommen allein von Ihm und Seinem Willen.
languages.original_text: {n}You and Adalbert kneel in prayer together. He says softly,{/n} "And there is no such darkness as would not flee from His light. Nor is there a life better than one lived for His glory. For all strength and all grace comes from Him alone and by His will."

traits.locale_text: {n}Du sinkst neben Adalbert zum Gebet auf die Knie. Er sagt leise:{/n} "Es gibt keine Dunkelheit, die nicht vor Seinem Licht flieht. Und es gibt kein besseres Leben, als ein Leben für Seinen Ruhm. Denn Stärke und Anmut kommen allein von Ihm und Seinem Willen.

languages.text: {n}Adalbert et vous vous agenouillez pour prier. Il murmure :{/n} « Et il n'est point de ténèbres qui ne fuient devant Sa lumière. Il n'est point non plus de vie meilleure que celle vécue pour Sa gloire. Car toute force et toute grâce viennent de Lui et par Sa volonté. »
languages.original_text: {n}You and Adalbert kneel in prayer together. He says softly,{/n} "And there is no such darkness as would not flee from His light. Nor is there a life better than one lived for His glory. For all strength and all grace comes from Him alone and by His will."

traits.locale_text: {n}Adalbert et vous vous agenouillez pour prier. Il murmure :{/n} « Et il n'est point de ténèbres qui ne fuient devant Sa lumière. Il n'est point non plus de vie meilleure que celle vécue pour Sa gloire. Car toute force et toute grâce viennent de Lui et par Sa volonté. »

languages.text: {n}Adalbert'le birlikte diz çöküp dua ediyorsun. Hafif bir sesle konuşuyor.{/n} "Ve O'nun ışığından kaçabilecek hiçbir karanlık yoktur. O'nun şerefine yaşanan bir yaşamdan daha iyi bir yaşam olamayacağı gibi. Nihayetinde tüm güç ve tüm inayet yalnızca O'ndan ve O'nun iradesiyle gelir."
languages.original_text: {n}You and Adalbert kneel in prayer together. He says softly,{/n} "And there is no such darkness as would not flee from His light. Nor is there a life better than one lived for His glory. For all strength and all grace comes from Him alone and by His will."
